rows.label: qev050107_MSG0001
rows.name: I had forgotten the plainspoken charms of Gi Ziordo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0002
rows.name:
There is a reason I chose to walk the warrior's path
with him when we were young cubs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0003
rows.name:
To think I nearly threw that all away over a single
difference of opinion. I was a laughable fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0004
rows.name:
You are here at our master's behest, correct?
Come to fight us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0005
rows.name:
I feel ready to defeat any challenger today. And you?
Is your blade keen and your mind sharp?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev050107_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you're ready when they are.

rows.label: qev050107_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev050107_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you still need to prepare.

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0006
rows.name:
That is wise. To face us in anything but full readiness
is to invite death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0007
rows.name:
Take all the time you need. A fight against a warrior
who is not at peak condition is no fight at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0008
rows.name: Gi Ziordo. You are ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0009
rows.name: Ready and long tired of waiting, my brother![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0010
rows.name:
If you watch my back, I will be free to use my strength
to its fullest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0011
rows.name: Understood. I know my role well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then let us show our friend the true measure of our
combined strengths![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0013
rows.name: Begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Or we could, were it not for the fact that someone is
already waiting here before us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0015
rows.name:
I ask that we wait for them to depart, so we may fight
with no distractions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050107_MSG0016
rows.name: I do not wish to involve innocents in our duel.[ST:wait ]
